author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a continuation of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34477. It changes FWCore/ParameterSet unit tests to use python 3, and fixes all the remaining python3 issues in these tests.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/28703. Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/189.

#### PR validation:

Effectively tested in CMSSW_12_0_X_2021-07-12-2300 that these tests run with python 3.
title: Use python3 in FWCore/ParameterSet unit tests
